text: @WhiteHouse @POTUS You’re winning! Every 45 second an American dies of Coronavirus. 70,000 dead & counting. Wonder how quickly it’ll increase to 100,000? Next 10 days! Wonder how many Republican protestors that wanted to end stay-at-home will get sick and die? Are Americans Collateral Damage?
